title: Blossom of Brilliance: Diamond Vanki Bangle
materials: G Color). Features Hyderabadi polish for a rich luster.
features: This exquisite vanki bangle showcases a three-row floral design, each delicate flower meticulously set with sparkling diamonds. The open cuff design offers modern elegance and comfort. The intricate framework ensures optimal light dispersion for maximum brilliance.
occasions: and upscale social gatherings. A stunning statement piece for both traditional and contemporary attire.
description: A captivating fusion of classic design and contemporary style. The floral motif symbolizes prosperity and joy, making it a meaningful and luxurious gift. The VVS clarity and G color diamonds ensure exceptional brilliance and value. Its Hyderabadi craftsmanship guarantees lasting beauty and durability.
